mapper.select: SELECT id, organization_id organizationId, system_module_id systemModuleId, `status` FROM base_organization_module WHERE organization_id = #{organizationId} AND system_module_id = #{systemModuleId}
SELECT bom.system_module_id systemModuleId, bom.organization_id organizationId FROM base_organization_module bom WHERE bom.id = #{id}

SELECT bsm.id, bsm.`code`, bsm.`index`, bsm.logo, bsm.`name`, bsm.remark, bsm.role, bom.id organizationModuleId, IF ( bom.system_module_id IS NULL, FALSE, TRUE ) isChoose FROM base_organization_module bom RIGHT JOIN base_system_module bsm ON bsm.id = bom.system_module_id AND bom.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND bom.`status`=0
